community.html.title: Community
community.title: Dip in our community
community.description: Cooperate with the most elite software develop team and the biggest NAS manufacturer in the world.
community.miner.description: We provide a platform to everyone for sharing idel bandwidth. Once you go out, you can provide the Wifi bandwidth, storage and other resources to us, and we will give you the rewards you deserve. As for those idel resources, we sold them to companies in need. Share your idle resources like Airbnb or Uber.
community.ambassador.title: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
community.ambassador.description: We provide a great amount of technical resources and opportunity to join in Poseidon Network. eg, Scholarship appllication, College Groups, Campus ambassador. We value our community qualitive and qauntitive both. As far as you are willing or interesting in Poseidon Network, and willing to share it to your groups or friends, we provide community bounty for these case.
